title: The vocal and instrumental musick of The prophetess, or, The history of Dioclesian composed by Henry Purcell ...
author: Purcell, Henry, 1659-1695.
publisher: Printed by J. Heptinstall for the author, and are to be sold by John Carr at his shop ...,
notes: The text was adapted from Beaumont and Fletcher's The prophetess by Thomas Betterton.
Reproduction of original in Library of Congress.
